dialogs.dialog: I must save Hcaep... Nothing else matters.
The relics... my only chance to reach her.
Stay sharp, Repus. Every step counts.
He's waiting... I have to be faster.
Hold on, Hcaep. I'm coming!
Doubt creeps in... Push it away.
Every trap is just a step closer.
Stay focused. Stay strong.
Another relic... I can almost see it.
Fear is a lie. Move forward.
The cold bites deep... I bite back.
Pain fades. Love remains.
No slowing down. No turning back.
Storms roar... I roar louder.
Each step... one promise closer.
Flames dance... but they can't stop me.
My heart burns brighter than fire.
Hcaep... I hear your call.
No fear. Only forward.
Relic found. Hope renewed.
Old memories... stay out of my way.
Focus, Repus. Don't drift.
The past is gone. Hcaep is now.
No more fear. Only love.
Strength. Love. Freedom.
The tunnels close in... I won't break.
Heartbeat steady. Mind sharp.
She's close... I can feel her light.
Final trial. Final breath.
Hcaep... I'm almost there!
